page.title: 07A Childs Day In Kirby Muxloe
page.content: My radio alarm wakes me at 7.15 and I check the time on the digital timer.Then I get up, get washed and dressed.I go down for breakfast, which is normally Weetabix, toast, and cream crackers. After breakfast I brush my hair,clean my teeth and pack my lunch. Dad,who is a teacher,leaves at 8.00.We play until 8.30 and then we go to school.When we get to school I usually go into my classroom for a few minutes and then go out to play with my sister and friends.At 9.00 the whstle goes and we go inside.Today is Thursday,the best weekday.We finish off Fletcher and reading and then go out to play for 15 minutes.Then it is swimming and I am in the third group.Lunchtime is from 12.00 to 1.30, I have a packed lunch.After dinner it is art and craft;we are making puppets.At 3.30 I play on the park.Bedtime is 8.30.{Jane
